Context: David Begg is the Associate Vice-President of Global Partnerships and Education at George Brown College, leading internationalization efforts and strategic collaborations. He previously held leadership roles in internationalization at Toronto Metropolitan University (Ryerson), where he developed the university's first international strategy in 2019 and led the Real Institute, establishing connections to academic units and stakeholders. David has a Bachelor of Arts in History from the University of Toronto and a Master of Education from OISE at the University of Toronto, specializing in Comparative, International and Development Education. For college updates and deadlines, sign up for notifications or contact George Brown College at 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information on this website is subject to change without notice.
